name: Advanced Training Lab
description: Engage in space-themed challenges and interactive play in this area that ignites the astronaut within you.

name: Akershus Royal Banquet Hall
description: Experience a royal feast fit for a princess in this enchanting dining hall where beloved Disney princesses greet guests and create magical memories.

name: Alberta Bound
description: Tap your feet to the lively rhythms and tunes of a Canadian musical group that celebrates the vibrant spirit of Alberta.

name: American Heritage Gallery
description: Immerse yourself in American history and culture through exhibits that showcase the diverse heritage and achievements of the United States.

name: Atlas Fusion
description: Immerse yourself in the artistry and athleticism of this acrobatic show that blends dance, music, and imagination from around the world.

name: Awesome Planet
description: Discover the beauty of Earth and the importance of conservation in this inspiring film that showcases the wonders of our planet.

name: Beauty and the Beast Sing-Along
description: Sing along to the enchanting tale of Beauty and the Beast in this interactive show that brings the beloved story to life with the magic of music and audience participation.

name: Biergarten Restaurant
description: Raise a stein to German culture and cuisine in this lively beer hall, where you can enjoy a festive buffet with live entertainment and communal dining.

name: Bijutsu-kan Gallery
description: Immerse yourself in the world of Japanese art and culture as this exhibit features rotating displays of captivating artistic masterpieces.

name: Bruce's Shark World
description: Join the adventure in this playful area inspired by Bruce, the friendly shark from Finding Nemo, where kids can explore, climb, and play.

name: Canada Far and Wide in Circle-Vision 360
description: Embark on a stunning journey across Canada's diverse landscapes and cultural heritage in this breathtaking 360-degree film.

name: Chefs de France
description: Dine in elegance at this authentic French brasserie, where you can savor classic French dishes prepared by skilled chefs.

name: Coral Reef Restaurant
description: Dine amidst an underwater paradise at this unique restaurant with massive aquarium walls, offering panoramic views of a diverse array of marine life.

name: Coral Reefs - Disney Animals
description: Discover the wonder of coral reefs and learn about their vital role in marine ecosystems. Explore marine life and conservation efforts dedicated to preserving these delicate underwater habitats.

name: Disney and Pixar Short Film Festival
description: Immerse yourself in heartwarming and entertaining short films featuring beloved Disney and Pixar characters in this 4D movie experience.

name: Disney® Visa® Cardmember Photo Opportunity at EPCOT
description: Capture a magical moment with exclusive Disney Visa Cardmember Photo Opportunities throughout EPCOT.

name: EPCOT Forever
description: Experience the magic of EPCOT with this nighttime spectacular featuring soaring fireworks, stunning visuals, and a celebration of the park's past, present, and future.

name: Frozen Ever After
description: Embark on an enchanting boat ride with Anna, Elsa, and Olaf from Disney's Frozen. Experience memorable scenes and songs from the beloved film while reliving the magic of Arendelle.

name: Gallery of Arts and History
description: Discover the captivating culture and history of Morocco as you explore exhibits featuring traditional Moroccan arts and crafts.

name: Garden Grill Restaurant
description: Feast on a delicious harvest-style meal at this rotating restaurant with views of Living with the Land.

name: Gran Fiesta Tour Starring The Three Caballeros
description: Embark on a whimsical boat journey with Donald Duck, José Carioca, and Panchito as they lead you on a fun-filled adventure through the heart of Mexico, featuring vibrant scenes and catchy tunes.

name: Groovin' Alps
description: Tap your feet to the lively rhythms of traditional Alpine music performed by this entertaining musical group.

name: Guardians of the Galaxy: Cosmic Rewind
description: Embark on an exhilarating cosmic adventure with the Guardians of the Galaxy in this thrilling indoor roller coaster.

name: House of the Whispering Willows
description: Immerse yourself in Chinese culture and tradition in this tranquil garden that tells the story of an ancient tale of love and transformation.

name: ImageWorks - The "What If" Labs
description: Let your creativity soar in this interactive playground where imagination knows no bounds. Engage in playful activities that inspire curiosity and fun for guests of all ages.

name: Impressions de France
description: Be transported to the beauty of France through this film that showcases its picturesque landscapes, iconic landmarks, and rich culture.

name: Invertebrates at EPCOT - Disney Animals
description: Learn about the fascinating world of invertebrates and their vital roles in ecosystems through interactive exhibits and educational experiences.

name: JAMMitors
description: Enjoy a lively percussion performance by this quirky group that uses everyday items to create infectious beats and rhythms.

name: Journey Into Imagination With Figment
description: Join Figment, the lovable purple dragon, on a whimsical journey through the imagination, celebrating creativity and the power of imagination.

name: Kidcot Fun Stops
description: Embark on an artistic adventure at various stops throughout the World Showcase, where kids can create and decorate special keepsakes inspired by different countries and cultures.

name: La Cava del Tequila
description: Discover the rich and diverse world of tequila as you sample premium selections and handcrafted cocktails in a cozy Mexican-inspired setting.

name: La Crêperie de Paris
description: Savor the sweet and savory delights of authentic French crepes in this charming Parisian-style crêperie.

name: La Hacienda de San Angel
description: Enjoy waterfront dining with stunning views of the World Showcase Lagoon while savoring authentic Mexican cuisine.

name: Le Cellier Steakhouse
description: Satisfy your appetite with delectable steaks and Canadian-inspired cuisine in a cozy cellar setting, celebrating the flavors of Canada.

name: Living with the Land
description: Embark on an educational boat journey through innovative greenhouses and sustainable farming techniques, showcasing the harmony between humanity and the environment.

name: Manatees - Disney Animals
description: Learn about the fascinating world of manatees and observe these gentle giants as they swim gracefully in their habitat.

name: Mariachi Cobre
description: Experience the vibrant sounds of traditional Mexican music as Mariachi Cobre fills the air with lively performances that celebrate the rich cultural heritage of Mexico.

name: Marimba de las Américas
description: Delight in the festive sounds of Latin America as this energetic musical group performs vibrant melodies and rhythms.

name: Matsuriza
description: Be mesmerized by the rhythmic beats of traditional Japanese taiko drumming as performers bring energy and excitement to the pavilion.

name: Meet Anna and Elsa at Royal Sommerhus
description: Meet and greet with the beloved sisters from Frozen in their charming summer cottage, where you can take photos and create magical memories.

name: Mexico Folk Art Gallery
description: Immerse yourself in the vibrant world of Mexican folk art as this gallery showcases the creativity and craftsmanship of traditional Mexican artisans.

name: Mission: SPACE
description: Experience the sensation of space travel as you embark on an exciting mission to Mars or orbit Earth in this thrilling simulator attraction.

name: Monsieur Paul
description: Experience the art of fine French dining in a sophisticated setting, where you can enjoy an exquisite menu created by talented chefs.

name: Nine Dragons Restaurant
description: Savor the flavors of China as this restaurant serves up delectable dishes influenced by regional Chinese cuisine.

name: Palais du Cinéma
description: Step into the captivating world of classic French cinema as this exhibit showcases the rich history and artistic contributions of French filmmakers. Explore the magic of iconic movie clips and treasures.

name: Project Tomorrow: Inventing the Wonders of the Future
description: Embark on a journey of innovation and possibilities in this interactive exhibit showcasing technological advancements and ideas that shape the world of tomorrow.

name: Reef Fish - Disney Animals
description: Observe and learn about a fascinating array of reef fish in this educational exhibit dedicated to the conservation of marine ecosystems.

name: Reflections of China
description: Immerse yourself in the beauty and culture of China as you journey through stunning landscapes and iconic landmarks in this 360-degree film.

name: Remy's Ratatouille Adventure
description: Join Remy, the tiny chef from Ratatouille, on a fun-filled adventure through Gusteau's restaurant in this 4D dark ride experience.

name: Restaurant Marrakesh
description: Experience the flavors of Morocco in a restaurant filled with vibrant colors and live entertainment, offering a taste of traditional Moroccan cuisine and culture.

name: Rose & Crown Dining Room
description: Savor classic British dishes and spirits in an authentic pub atmosphere overlooking the World Showcase Lagoon.

name: Rose & Crown Pub Musician
description: Unwind in a cozy British pub atmosphere and enjoy live musical performances while savoring British fare and drinks.

name: San Angel Inn Restaurante
description: Transport yourself to a romantic Mexican courtyard setting while savoring authentic Mexican cuisine amidst views of the starlit night.

name: Sea Turtles - Disney Animals
description: Get up close to sea turtles and learn about their fascinating behaviors and conservation efforts to protect these magnificent creatures.

name: SeaBase
description: Immerse yourself in an underwater adventure as you explore a massive saltwater aquarium teeming with marine life from around the world.

name: Sergio
description: Witness the captivating juggling skills and comedic talents of Sergio as he entertains guests of all ages with his lively street performances.

name: Sharks and Rays - Disney Animals
description: Encounter and learn about the fascinating world of sharks and rays in this interactive exhibit dedicated to marine life education and conservation.

name: Soarin' Around the World
description: Take flight on an exhilarating simulated hang-gliding adventure over awe-inspiring global landmarks and natural wonders. Experience the breathtaking beauty of the world from a unique perspective.

name: Space 220 Lounge
description: Elevate your dining experience in this celestial-themed lounge offering an array of creative cocktails and picturesque views of outer space.

name: Space 220 Restaurant
description: Elevate your dining experience to new heights as you enjoy out-of-this-world cuisine in a space-themed restaurant with breathtaking views of Earth from space.

name: Spaceship Earth
description: Embark on a time-traveling journey through the history of communication and human progress in this iconic geodesic sphere attraction.

name: Spaceship Earth: A Beacon of Magic
description: Marvel at the iconic Spaceship Earth as it transforms into a stunning beacon of light, illuminating the night sky with an inspiring spectacle.

name: Spice Road Table
description: Delight your senses with the flavors of the Mediterranean in this picturesque waterfront restaurant, offering delectable dishes and stunning views.

name: Stave Church Gallery
description: Step into a traditional Norwegian stave church and explore exhibits highlighting Norway's captivating history and folklore.

name: Takumi-Tei
description: Indulge in an upscale dining experience with a kaiseki multi-course menu that celebrates seasonal Japanese ingredients. Immerse yourself in the refined ambiance inspired by the beauty of Japan.

name: Teppan Edo
description: Experience the art of teppanyaki dining as skilled chefs prepare your meal with flair right before your eyes. Enjoy delicious Japanese dishes in an interactive and entertaining setting.

name: Test Track
description: Design your own virtual concept vehicle and then put it to the test on an exhilarating high-speed ride through a series of thrilling automotive challenges.

name: The American Adventure
description: Embark on a patriotic journey through American history, culture, and accomplishments in this inspiring multimedia show featuring audio-animatronics and stirring music.

name: The Seas with Nemo & Friends
description: Dive into an underwater world with live animals, interactive exhibits, and an adventure with Nemo and friends in this pavilion dedicated to marine exploration and conservation.

name: Tokyo Dining
description: Savor an array of delectable Japanese dishes in a contemporary setting that captures the essence of modern Tokyo dining.

name: Turtle Talk With Crush
description: Dive into an interactive show where you can chat and interact with Crush, the beloved sea turtle from Finding Nemo, in an unforgettable undersea adventure filled with humor and surprises.

name: Tutto Italia Ristorante
description: Indulge in the flavors of Italy in this charming trattoria, where you can savor traditional Italian cuisine and savor the essence of Italy.

name: Via Napoli Ristorante e Pizzeria
description: Delight in mouthwatering Neapolitan pizzas and traditional Italian dishes in this vibrant pizzeria, inspired by the authentic flavors of Southern Italy.

name: Viva Mexico
description: Discover authentic Mexican craftsmanship and souvenirs at this vibrant open-air marketplace showcasing the creativity and talent of Mexican artisans.

name: Voices of Liberty
description: Be enchanted by the harmonious a cappella performances of this talented vocal group, showcasing American patriotic songs and classic melodies.
